name: Entro WordPress Coming Soon per post/page or global
author: EntroThemes

sections.description:
Entro WordPress Coming Soon per post/page or global is a plugin which provides coming soon and/or under construction functionality. Administrators can choose from 6 different templates for global or 3 templates for page/post. Each template has a functionality to integrate with Mailchimp, set timer, set social links add info box and set title. All templates are responsive and translation ready.

Features:

  • Responsive design
  • 6 templates for global coming soon/under construction
  • 3 templates per page/post coming soon/under construction PRO version ONLY
  • Video background templates integrated with YouTube and Vimeo PRO version ONLY
  • Animated background templates
  • Static image background templates
  • Countdown timer
  • Integration with Mailchimp
  • Social media links Links to most used and popular social media links
  • Administrator check Our plugin will detect and not shown coming soon template if logged used is administrator
  • Color customization
  • Easy Install
  • Translation Ready
  • SEO Ready
  • WordPress Best Practices

Need Help?:

  • Video support
  • Ticket system
  • Subscribe for latest news

Follow Us:

  • Follow us on Facebook
  • Follow us on Twitter
  • Follow us on Envato
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/coming-soon-plugin-light directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Coming Soon screen to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Bug fix Safari Video templates
  • Mobile devices will use image on video templates

1.0.1

  • Bug fix for old PHP versions

1.0.2

  • Bug fix calendar format
